trans-unit.source: Rotates an object clockwise about a specified point in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 旋转有关中的指定点顺时针旋转某个对象[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]x，y 坐标系统。

trans-unit.source: A RotateTransform rotates an object by a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle%2A> about the point <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Rotatetransform 旋转通过指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle%2A>有关点<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle%2A>旋转某个对象

trans-unit.source: When you use a RotateTransform, realize that the transformation rotates the coordinate system for a particular object about the point (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 当使用 rotatetransform 旋转时，请注意转换旋转的点 （0，0） 有关的特定对象坐标系统。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, depending on the position of the object, it might not rotate in place (around its center).
trans-unit.target: 因此，具体取决于对象的位置，可能不会就地 （围绕其中心） 旋转。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an object is positioned 200 units from 0 along the x-axis, a rotation of 30 degrees can swing the object 30 degrees along a circle that has a radius of 200, which is drawn around the origin.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对象是从 0 沿 x 轴位于 200 个单位，旋转 30 度可以将该对象 30 度沿一个半径为 200 的绘制沿原点的圆圈。

trans-unit.source: To rotate an object in place, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A> of the RotateTransform to the center of the object to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 若要旋转就地对象，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>的对象的中心到 rotatetransform 旋转旋转。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the RotateTransform class provides several special features: RotateTransform objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能︰**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，rotatetransform 旋转类提供了一些特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享，使只读的以提高性能，克隆，并进行线程安全 rotatetransform 旋转对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref> class that has the specified angle, in degrees, of clockwise rotation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>具有以度为单位顺时针旋转指定的角度的类。

trans-unit.source: The rotation is centered on the origin, (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 旋转中心的来源，(0，0)。

trans-unit.source: The clockwise rotation angle, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 顺时针旋转的角度，以度为单位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref> class that has the specified angle and center point.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>具有指定的角度和中心点的类。

trans-unit.source: The clockwise rotation angle, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 顺时针旋转的角度，以度为单位。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle*>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the center point for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中心点的 x 坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX*>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the center point for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中心点的 y 坐标<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle, in degrees, of clockwise rotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的角度，以度数 （顺时针旋转）。

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>, realize that the transformation rotates the coordinate system for a particular object about the point (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>，认识到转换旋转的点 （0，0） 有关的特定对象坐标系统。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, depending on the position of the object, it might not rotate in place (around its center).
trans-unit.target: 因此，具体取决于对象的位置，可能不会就地 （围绕其中心） 旋转。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an object is positioned 200 units from 0 along the x-axis, a rotation of 30 degrees can swing the object 30 degrees along a circle that has a radius of 200, which is drawn around the origin.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对象是从 0 沿 x 轴位于 200 个单位，旋转 30 度可以将该对象 30 度沿一个半径为 200 的绘制沿原点的圆圈。

trans-unit.source: To rotate an object in place, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> to the center of the object to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 若要旋转就地对象，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>到要旋转的对象的中心。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, of clockwise rotation.
trans-unit.target: 角度 （以度为单位，顺时针旋转）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.Angle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the rotation center point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置旋转中心点的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>, realize that the transformation rotates the coordinate system for a particular object about the point (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>，认识到转换旋转的点 （0，0） 有关的特定对象坐标系统。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, depending on the position of the object, it might not rotate in place (around its center).
trans-unit.target: 因此，具体取决于对象的位置，可能不会就地 （围绕其中心） 旋转。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an object is positioned 200 units from 0 along the x-axis, a rotation of 30 degrees can swing the object 30 degrees along a circle that has a radius of 200, which is drawn around the origin.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对象是从 0 沿 x 轴位于 200 个单位，旋转 30 度可以将该对象 30 度沿一个半径为 200 的绘制沿原点的圆圈。

trans-unit.source: To rotate an object in place, set the CenterX and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> to the center of the object to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 若要旋转就地对象，设置 CenterX 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>到要旋转的对象的中心。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the center of rotation.
trans-unit.target: 旋转中心的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default is `0`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX*> dependency property.

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the rotation center point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置旋转中心点的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>, realize that the transformation rotates the coordinate system for a particular object about the point (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>，认识到转换旋转的点 （0，0） 有关的特定对象坐标系统。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, depending on the position of the object, it might not rotate in place (around its center).
trans-unit.target: 因此，具体取决于对象的位置，可能不会就地 （围绕其中心） 旋转。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an object is positioned 200 units from 0 along the x-axis, a rotation of 30 degrees can swing the object 30 degrees along a circle that has a radius of 200, which is drawn around the origin.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果对象是从 0 沿 x 轴位于 200 个单位，旋转 30 度可以将该对象 30 度沿一个半径为 200 的绘制沿原点的圆圈。

trans-unit.source: To rotate an object in place, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A> and CenterY of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> to the center of the object to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 若要旋转就地对象，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>和的 CenterY<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>到要旋转的对象的中心。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterX%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the center of rotation.
trans-unit.target: 旋转中心的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default is `0`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform.CenterY%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>通过深层复制其值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法复制依赖项属性时，会复制资源引用和数据绑定，但它们可能不再解析。

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 它不会复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 克隆对象的属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *1> 的源属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform"></xref>通过深层复制其值的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, or animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会复制资源引用、 数据绑定或动画，但复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 克隆对象的属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *1> 的源属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current rotation transformation as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为当前旋转转换<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The current rotation transformation as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为当前的旋转转换<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>。
